summary: Completed comprehensive testing of body fat metric migration from waist. All backend endpoints, frontend UI, and backward compatibility working correctly.
passed_tests: POST /api/fitness/body-fat accepts {day, body_fat_pct} and stores metric kind=body_fat
GET /api/fitness/metrics returns body_fat in metrics and latest.body_fat_pct in latest
POST /api/fitness/waist still works as deprecated alias to body-fat endpoint
Frontend Fitness tab shows 'Log body fat' card (renamed from waist)
Frontend fitness chart displays 'Body fat (%)' series correctly
Frontend dashboard shows latest body fat percentage
Body fat entry form submission works correctly
Chart updates with new body fat data points
Backward compatibility maintained for old waist endpoint
